Avtalet Ã¤r avfattat pÃ¥ svenska, portugisiska och engelska. Den svenska och engelska texten framgÃ¥r av bilagan till denna lag.</P>
<P class="p30 ft4"><SPAN class="ft14">2 Â§ </SPAN>Avtalets beskattningsregler ska tillÃ¤mpas endast till den del dessa medfÃ¶r inskrÃ¤nkning av den skattskyldighet i Sverige som annars skulle fÃ¶religga.</P>

<P class="p33 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">kÃ¤llskatter, pÃ¥ belopp som betalas eller tillgodofÃ¶rs den 1 januari det Ã¥r som fÃ¶ljer nÃ¤rmast efter den dag dÃ¥ lagen trÃ¤der i kraft eller senare,</SPAN></P>

<P class="p35 ft2">3. Genom denna lag upphÃ¤vs</P>
<P class="p34 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">fÃ¶rordningen (1975:1427) om tillÃ¤mpning av avtal mellan Sverige och Brasilien fÃ¶r undvikande av dubbelbeskattning betrÃ¤ffande inkomstskatter, m.m., och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p33 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">fÃ¶rordningen (1975:1428) om kupongskatt fÃ¶r person med hemvist i Brasilien, m.m.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p36 ft2">4. Den upphÃ¤vda fÃ¶rordningen om tillÃ¤mpning av avtal mellan Sverige och Brasilien fÃ¶r undvikande av dubbelbeskattning betrÃ¤ffande inkomstskatter, m.m. gÃ¤ller dock fortfarande i frÃ¥ga om</P>
<P class="p33 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">kÃ¤llskatter, pÃ¥ belopp som betalas eller tillgodofÃ¶rs fÃ¶re den 1 januari det Ã¥r som fÃ¶ljer nÃ¤rmast efter den dag dÃ¥ lagen trÃ¤der i kraft, och</SPAN></P>
<P class="p34 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">andra skatter pÃ¥ inkomst, pÃ¥ skatt som pÃ¥fÃ¶rs fÃ¶r beskattningsÃ¥r som bÃ¶rjar fÃ¶re den 1 januari det Ã¥r som fÃ¶ljer nÃ¤rmast efter den dag dÃ¥ lagen trÃ¤der i kraft.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p40 ft4">som Ã¶nskar ingÃ¥ ett avtal fÃ¶r undvikande av dubbelbeskattning betrÃ¤ffande inkomstskatter,</P>

<P class="p46 ft13">Convention between Sweden and Brazil for the avoidance of double taxation with respect to taxes on income</P>
<P class="p47 ft2">The Government of the Kingdom of Sweden and the Government of the Federative Republic of Brazil; Desiring to conclude a Convention for the avoidance of double taxation with respect to taxes on</P>
<P class="p48 ft2">income;</P>
<P class="p49 ft2">Intending to eliminate double taxation with respect to taxes on income without creating opportunities for <NOBR>non-taxation</NOBR> or reduced taxation through tax evasion or avoidance (including through treatyshopping arrangements aimed at obtaining reliefs provided in this Convention for the indirect benefit of residents of third States);</P>
<P class="p50 ft2">Have agreed as follows:</P>
<P class="p51 ft19">Article 1</P>

<P class="p53 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">Detta avtal tillÃ¤mpas pÃ¥ personer som har hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat eller i bÃ¥da avtalsslutande staterna.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p54 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Vid tillÃ¤mpningen av detta avtal ska inkomst som fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvas av eller genom en person, som enligt skattelagstiftningen i nÃ¥gon av de avtalsslutande staterna helt eller delvis Ã¤r fÃ¶remÃ¥l fÃ¶r delÃ¤garbeskattning, anses fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvad av en person med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat till den del som inkomsten, enligt skattelagstift-</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3_2">
<P class="p53 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">This Convention shall apply to persons who are residents of one or both of the Contracting States.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p55 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">For the purposes of this Convention, income derived by or through an entity or arrangement that is treated as wholly or partly fiscally transparent under the tax law of either Contracting State shall be considered to be income of a resident of a Contracting State but only to the extent that the income is treated, for purposes of taxation by</SPAN></P>

<P class="p59 ft2">1.<SPAN class="ft18">3 </SPAN>De fÃ¶r nÃ¤rvarande utgÃ¥ende skatter pÃ¥ vilka detta avtal tillÃ¤mpas Ã¤r:</P>

<P class="p60 ft2">b) i Brasilien:</P>

<P class="p66 ft4">(i det fÃ¶ljande benÃ¤mnda â€brasiliansk skattâ€).</P>
<P class="p67 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">Avtalet tillÃ¤mpas Ã¤ven pÃ¥ skatter av samma eller i huvudsak likartat slag som senare uttages vid sidan av eller i stÃ¤llet fÃ¶r de ovan nÃ¤mnda skatterna. De behÃ¶riga myndigheterna i de avtalsslutande staterna skall meddela varandra de vÃ¤sentliga Ã¤ndringar som skett i respektive skattelagstiftning.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_3_2">
<P class="p68 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">The existing taxes to which the Convention shall apply are:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p69 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">in the case of Sweden:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p68 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">i)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">the national income tax (den statliga inkomstskatten);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p68 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">ii)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">the withholding tax on dividends (kupongskatten);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p70 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">iii)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">the income tax on nonresidents (den sÃ¤rskilda inkomstskatten fÃ¶r utomlands bosatta);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p70 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">iv)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">the income tax on nonresident artistes and athletes (den sÃ¤rskilda inkomstskatten fÃ¶rutomlands bosatta artister m.fl.); and</SPAN></P>
<P class="p68 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">v)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">the municipal income tax (den kommunala inkomstskatten);</SPAN></P>
<P class="p71 ft6">(hereinafter referred to as â€œSwedish taxâ€);</P>
<P class="p72 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">in the case of Brazil: the federal income tax; (hereinafter referred to as</SPAN></P>
<P class="p52 ft2">â€œBrazilian taxâ€).</P>
<P class="p73 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">The Convention shall also apply to any identical or substantially similar taxes which are subsequently imposed in addition to, or in place of, the aforementioned taxes. The competent authorities of the Contracting States shall notify to each other any substantial changes which have been made in their respective taxation laws.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p80 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">g)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Uttrycket â€internationell trafikâ€ inbegriper trafik som utÃ¶vas mellan orter i ett och samma land, vilken ingÃ¥r som en del av en resa som strÃ¤cker sig Ã¶ver mer Ã¤n ett land.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_3_2">
<P class="p100 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">For the purposes of this Convention, the term â€œresident of a Contracting Stateâ€ means any person who, under the law of that State, is liable to taxation therein by reason of his domicile, residence, place of management or any other criterion of a similar nature.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p101 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">Where by reason of the provisions of paragraph 1 an individual is a resident of both Contracting States, then his status shall be determined in accordance with the following rules:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p102 ft2">a) He shall be deemed to be a resident of the Contracting State in which he has a permanent home available to him. If he has a permanent home available to him in both Contracting States, he shall be deemed to be a resident of the Contracting State with which his personal and economic relations are closest (centre of vital interests);</P>
<P class="p103 ft6">b) If the Contracting State in which he has his centre of vital interests cannot be determined, or if</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV id="page_9">


<DIV id="id_1">
<DIV id="id_1_1">
<P class="p104 ft2">om han icke i nÃ¥gondera avtalsslutande staten har ett hem, som stadigvarande stÃ¥r till hans fÃ¶rfogande, anses han ha hemvist i den avtalsslutande stat, dÃ¤r han stadigvarande vistas.</P>
<P class="p105 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">Om han stadigvarande vistas i bÃ¥da avtalsslutande staterna eller om han icke vistas stadigvarande i nÃ¥gon av dem, anses han ha hemvist i den avtalsslutande stat dÃ¤r han Ã¤r medborgare.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p106 ft23"><SPAN class="ft2">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft31">Om han Ã¤r medborgare i bÃ¥da avtalsslutande staterna eller om han icke Ã¤r medborgare i nÃ¥gon av dem, avgÃ¶r de behÃ¶riga myndigheterna i de avtalsslutande staterna frÃ¥gan genom Ã¶verenskommelse.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p107 ft2">3.<SPAN class="ft18">4 </SPAN>DÃ¥ pÃ¥ grund av bestÃ¤mmelserna i punkt 1 annan person Ã¤n fysisk person har hemvist i bÃ¥da avtalsslutande staterna, ska de behÃ¶riga myndigheterna i de avtalsslutande staterna genom Ã¶msesidig Ã¶verenskommelse sÃ¶ka avgÃ¶ra i vilken avtalsslutande stat personen ska anses ha hemvist vid tillÃ¤mpning av avtalet, med hÃ¤nsyn till platsen fÃ¶r dess verkliga ledning, den lagstiftning enligt vilken personen har bildats och andra relevanta omstÃ¤ndigheter. I avsaknad av sÃ¥dan Ã¶verenskommelse ska personen inte vara berÃ¤ttigad till nÃ¥gon nedsÃ¤ttning av eller befrielse frÃ¥n skatt enligt avtalet, utom till den del och pÃ¥ det sÃ¤tt som de behÃ¶riga myndigheterna i de avtalsslutande staterna kommer Ã¶verens om.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p52 ft6">he has not a permanent home Prop. 2019/20:43 available to him in either Con-</P>
<P class="p108 ft2">tracting State, he shall be deemed to be a resident of the Contracting State in which he has an habitual abode;</P>
<P class="p109 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">If he has an habitual abode in both Contracting States or in neither of them, he shall be deemed to be a resident of the Contracting State of which he is a national;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p110 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">If he is a national of both Contracting States or of neither of them, the competent authorities of the Contracting States shall settle the question by mutual agreement.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p111 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Where by reason of the provisions of paragraph 1 a person other than an individual is a resident of both Contracting States, the competent authorities of the Contracting States shall endeavour to determine by mutual agreement the Contracting State of which such person shall be deemed to be a resident for the purposes of the Convention, having regard to its place of effective management, the place where it is incorporated or otherwise constituted and any other relevant factors. In the absence of such agreement, such person shall not be entitled to any relief or exemption from tax provided by this Convention except to the extent and in such manner as may be agreed upon by the competent authorities of the Contracting States.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<P class="p120 ft6">establishmentâ€ means a fixed place of business in which the business of the enterprise is wholly or partly carried on.</P>
<P class="p121 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">The term â€œpermanent establishmentâ€ includes especially:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p60 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">a place of management;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p60 ft2">b) a branch;</P>

<P class="p122 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">f)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">a mine, quarry or other place of extraction of natural resources;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p123 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">g)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">a building site or construction or assembly project which exists for more than six months.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p124 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">The term â€œpermanent establishmentâ€ shall not be deemed to include:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p70 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">the use of facilities solely for the purpose of storage, display or delivery of goods or merchandise belonging to the enterprise;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p125 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">the maintenance of a stock of goods or merchandise belonging to the enterprise solely for the purpose of storage, display or delivery;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p126 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">the maintenance of a stock of goods or merchandise belonging to the enterprise solely for the purpose of processing by another enterprise;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p70 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">the maintenance of a fixed place of business solely for the purpose of purchasing goods or merchandise, or for collecting information, for the enterprise;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p127 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">the maintenance of a fixed place of business solely for the purpose of advertising, for the supply of information, for scientific research or for similar activities which have a preparatory or auxiliary character for the enterprise.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p130 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">FÃ¶retag i en avtalsslutande stat anses icke ha fast driftstÃ¤lle i den andra avtalsslutande staten endast pÃ¥ den grund att fÃ¶retaget uppehÃ¥ller affÃ¤rsfÃ¶rbindelser i denna andra stat genom fÃ¶rmedling av mÃ¤klare, kommissionÃ¤r eller annan oberoende representant, under fÃ¶rutsÃ¤ttning att denna person dÃ¤rvid utÃ¶var sin vanliga affÃ¤rsverksamhet.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p131 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Den omstÃ¤ndigheten att ett bolag med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat kontrollerar eller kontrolleras av ett bolag med hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten eller av ett bolag som uppehÃ¥ller affÃ¤rsfÃ¶rbindelser i denna andra stat (antingen genom fast driftstÃ¤lle eller pÃ¥ annat sÃ¤tt), medfÃ¶r icke i och fÃ¶r sig att nÃ¥gotdera bolaget betraktas sÃ¥som fast driftstÃ¤lle fÃ¶r det andra bolaget.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p132 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">An enterprise of a Contracting State shall not be deemed to have a permanent establishment in the other Contracting State merely because it carries on business in that other State through a broker, general commission agent or any other agent of an independent status, where such persons are acting in the ordinary course of their business.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p131 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">The fact that a company which is a resident of a Contracting State controls or is controlled by a company which is a resident of the other Contracting State, or which carries on business in that other State (whether through a permanent establishment or otherwise), shall not of itself constitute either company a permanent establishment of the other.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV id="id_2">
<DIV id="id_2_1">
<P class="p95 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Inkomst av fastighet fÃ¥r beskattas i den avtalsslutande stat dÃ¤r fastigheten Ã¤r belÃ¤gen.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p134 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">a) Med fÃ¶rbehÃ¥ll fÃ¶r bestÃ¤mmelserna i punkterna b och c har uttrycket â€fastighetâ€ den betydelse som uttrycket har enligt gÃ¤llande lagar i den avtalsslutande stat dÃ¤r fastigheten i frÃ¥ga Ã¤r belÃ¤gen.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p106 ft2">b) Uttrycket inbegriper dock alltid egendom som utgÃ¶r tillbehÃ¶r till fastighet, levande och dÃ¶da inventarier i lantbruk och skogsbruk, rÃ¤ttigheter pÃ¥ vilka fÃ¶reskrifterna i allmÃ¤n lag angÃ¥ende fastigheter Ã¤r tillÃ¤mpliga, nyttjanderÃ¤tt till fastighet samt rÃ¤tt till fÃ¶rÃ¤nderliga eller fasta ersÃ¤ttningar fÃ¶r nyttjandet av eller rÃ¤tten att nyttja mineralfyndighet, kÃ¤lla eller annan naturtillgÃ¥ng.</P>
<P class="p135 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">Fartyg, bÃ¥tar och luftfartyg anses icke som fastighet.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p136 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">BestÃ¤mmelserna i punkt 1 tillÃ¤mpas pÃ¥ inkomst, som fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvas genom omedelbart brukande, genom uthyrning eller genom annan anvÃ¤ndning av fastighet.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p137 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">BestÃ¤mmelserna i punkterna 1 och 3 tillÃ¤mpas Ã¤ven pÃ¥ inkomst av fastighet som tillhÃ¶r fÃ¶retag och pÃ¥ inkomst av fastighet som anvÃ¤ndes vid utÃ¶vande av fritt yrke.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p100 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">Income from immovable property may be taxed in the Contracting State in which such property is situated.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p138 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">a) Subject to the provisions of </SPAN><NOBR>sub-paragraphs</NOBR> b) and c) the term â€œimmovable propertyâ€ shall be defined in accordance with the law of the Contracting State in which the property in question is situated;</P>
<P class="p102 ft2">b) the term shall, however, in any case include property accessory to immovable property, livestock and equipment used in agriculture and forestry, rights to which the provisions of general law respecting immovable property apply, usufruct of immovable property and rights to variable or fixed payments as consideration for the working of, or the right to work, mineral deposits, sources and other natural resources;</P>
<P class="p139 ft4">c) ships, boats and aircraft shall not be regarded as immovable property.</P>
<P class="p140 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">The provisions of paragraph 1 shall apply to income derived from the direct use, letting, or use in any other form of immovable property.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p141 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">The provisions of paragraphs 1 and 3 shall also apply to the income from immovable property of an enterprise and to income from immovable property used for the performance of professional services.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<DIV id="id_4_2">
<P class="p95 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">The profits of an enterprise of a Contracting State shall be taxable</SPAN></P>

<P class="p104 ft2">slutande stat beskattas endast i denna stat, sÃ¥vida icke fÃ¶retaget bedriver rÃ¶relse i den andra avtalsslutande staten frÃ¥n dÃ¤r belÃ¤get fast driftstÃ¤lle. Om fÃ¶retaget bedriver rÃ¶relse pÃ¥ nyss angivet sÃ¤tt, fÃ¥r fÃ¶retagets inkomst beskattas i den andra staten men endast sÃ¥ stor del dÃ¤rav, som Ã¤r hÃ¤nfÃ¶rlig till det fasta driftstÃ¤llet.</P>
<P class="p143 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Om fÃ¶retag i en avtalsslutande stat bedriver rÃ¶relse i den andra avtalsslutande staten frÃ¥n dÃ¤r belÃ¤get fast driftstÃ¤lle, hÃ¤nfÃ¶res i vardera avtalsslutande staten till det fasta driftstÃ¤llet den inkomst av rÃ¶relse, som det kan antagas att driftstÃ¤llet skulle ha fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvat, om det varit ett fristÃ¥ende fÃ¶retag, som bedrivit verksamhet av samma eller liknande slag under samma eller liknande villkor och sjÃ¤lvstÃ¤ndigt avslutat affÃ¤rer med det fÃ¶retag till vilket driftstÃ¤llet hÃ¶r.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p144 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">Vid bestÃ¤mmandet av inkomst, som Ã¤r hÃ¤nfÃ¶rlig till det fasta driftstÃ¤llet, medges avdrag fÃ¶r kostnader som uppkommit fÃ¶r det fasta driftstÃ¤llets rÃ¤kning, hÃ¤runder inbegripna kostnader fÃ¶r fÃ¶retagets ledning och allmÃ¤nna fÃ¶rvaltning.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p145 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">Inkomst anses icke hÃ¤nfÃ¶rlig till fast driftstÃ¤lle endast av den anledningen att varor inkÃ¶pes genom det fasta driftstÃ¤llets fÃ¶rsorg fÃ¶r fÃ¶retagets rÃ¤kning.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p146 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">IngÃ¥r i rÃ¶relseinkomsten inkomstslag, som behandlas sÃ¤rskilt i andra artiklar av detta avtal, berÃ¶res bestÃ¤mmelserna i dessa artiklar icke av reglerna i fÃ¶revarande artikel.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p52 ft6">only in that State unless the Prop. 2019/20:43 enterprise carries on business in the</P>
<P class="p147 ft2">other Contracting State through a permanent establishment situated therein. If the enterprise carries on business as aforesaid, the profits of the enterprise may be taxed in the other State but only so much of them as is attributable to that permanent establishment.</P>
<P class="p148 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Where an enterprise of a Contracting State carries on business in the other Contracting State through a permanent establishment situated therein, there shall in each Contracting State be attributed to that permanent establishment the profits which it might be expected to make if it were a distinct and separate enterprise engaged in the same or similar activities under the same or similar conditions and dealing wholly independently with the enterprise of which it is a permanent establishment.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p149 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">In the determination of the profits of a permanent establishment, there shall be allowed as deductions expenses which are incurred for the purposes of the permanent establishment including executive and general administrative expenses so incurred.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p150 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">No profits shall be attributed to a permanent establishment by reason of the mere purchase by that permanent establishment of goods or merchandise for the enterprise.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p110 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">Where profits include items of income which are dealt with separately in other Articles of this Convention, then the provisions of those Articles shall not be affected by the provisions of this Article.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p136 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">BestÃ¤mmelserna i denna artikel tillÃ¤mpas betrÃ¤ffande inkomst som fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvas av det svenska, danska och norska luftfartskonsortiet Scandinavian Airlines System (SAS) men endast i frÃ¥ga om den del av inkomsten som motsvarar den andel i konsortiet vilken innehas av AB Aerotransport (ABA), den svenske delÃ¤garen i Scandinavian Airlines System (SAS).</SPAN></P>

<P class="p138 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">With respect to profits derived by the Swedish, Danish and Norwegian air transport consortium, known as Scandinavian Airlines System (SAS) the provisions of this Article shall apply, but only to such part of the profits as corresponds to the shareholding in that consortium held by A. <P class="p52 ft19">Article 9</P>
<P class="p76 ft3">Associated enterprises</P>
<P class="p153 ft2">Where</P>
<P class="p154 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">an enterprise of a Contracting State participates directly or indirectly in the management, control or capital of an enterprise of the other Contracting State, or</SPAN></P>
<P class="p123 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">the same persons participate directly or indirectly in the management, control or capital of an enterprise of a Contracting State and an enterprise of the other Contracting State,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p155 ft2">and in either case conditions are made or imposed between the two enterprises in their commercial or financial relations which differ from those which would be made between independent enterprises, then any profits which would, but for those conditions, have accrued to one of the enterprises, but, by</P>

</DIV>

<DIV id="id_1">

<P class="p38 ft6">koren i frÃ¥ga icke tillkommit detta fÃ¶retag, inrÃ¤knas i detta fÃ¶retags inkomst och beskattas i Ã¶verensstÃ¤mmelse dÃ¤rmed.</P>
<P class="p82 ft19">Artikel 10<SPAN class="ft18">5</SPAN></P>

<P class="p52 ft3">Utdelning<SPAN style="padding-left:151px;">Dividends</SPAN></P>

<P class="p130 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">Utdelning frÃ¥n bolag med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat till person med hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten fÃ¥r beskattas i denna andra stat.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p159 ft28">2.<SPAN class="ft33">6 </SPAN>Utdelningen fÃ¥r emellertid beskattas Ã¤ven i den avtalsslutande stat dÃ¤r bolaget som betalar utdelningen har hemvist, enligt lagstiftningen i denna stat, men om den som har rÃ¤tt till utdelningen har hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten fÃ¥r skatten inte Ã¶verstiga:</P>
<P class="p143 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">10 procent av utdelningens bruttobelopp om den som har rÃ¤tt till utdelningen Ã¤r ett bolag som direkt innehar minst 10 procent av det utdelande bolagets rÃ¶stetal under en period om 365 dagar som innefattar den dag dÃ¥ utdelningen betalas ut (vid berÃ¤kningen av denna period beaktas inte fÃ¶rÃ¤ndringar i Ã¤gande som direkt fÃ¶ljer av en omstrukturering, sÃ¥som fusion eller fission av det bolag som innehar aktierna eller betalar utdelningen),</SPAN></P>
<P class="p160 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">15 procent av utdelningens bruttobelopp i Ã¶vriga fall.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p146 ft4">Denna punkt berÃ¶r inte bolagets beskattning fÃ¶r den vinst av vilken utdelningen betalats.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3_2">
<P class="p132 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">Dividends paid by a company which is a resident of a Contracting State to a resident of the other Contracting State may be taxed in that other State.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p161 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">However, such dividends may also be taxed in the Contracting State of which the company paying the dividends is a resident and according to the laws of that State, but if the beneficial owner of the dividends is a resident of the other Contracting State the tax so charged shall not exceed:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p162 ft2">a) 10 per cent of the gross amount of the dividends if the beneficial owner is a company which holds directly at least 10 per cent of the voting power of the company paying the dividends throughout a 365 day period that includes the day of the payment of the dividend (for the purpose of computing that period, no account shall be taken of changes of ownership that would directly result from a corporate reorganisation, such as a merger or divisive reorganisation, of the company that holds the shares or that pays the dividend);</P>
<P class="p163 ft6">b) 15 per cent of the gross amount of the dividends in all other cases.</P>
<P class="p132 ft6">This paragraph shall not affect the taxation of the company in respect of the profits out of which the dividends are paid.</P>
</DIV>
</DIV>

<P class="p173 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">However, such interest may also be taxed in the Contracting State in which it arises and according to the laws of that State, but if the beneficial owner of the interest is a resident of the other Contracting State the tax so charged shall not exceed:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p174 ft6">a) 10 per cent of the gross amount of the interest in respect of interest from loans and credits granted by a bank for a period of at least 7 years in connection with the selling of industrial equipment or of investment projects, as well as with the financing of public works;</P>
<P class="p175 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">15 per cent of the gross amount of the interest in all other cases.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p176 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Notwithstanding the provisions of paragraphs 1 and 2 interest arising in a Contracting State and paid to the Government of the other Contracting State, a political subdivision or local authority thereof or any agency (including a financial institution) wholly owned by that Government, political subdivision or local authority or to the Central Bank of that other Contracting State shall be exempt from tax in the </SPAN><NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> Contracting State.</P>
<P class="p177 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">The term â€œinterestâ€ as used in this Article means income from Government securities, bonds or debentures, whether or not secured by mortgage and whether or not carrying a right to participate in profits, and </SPAN><NOBR>debt-claims</NOBR> of every kind as well as other income assimilated to income from money</P>

Om den person som betalar rÃ¤ntan, antingen han har hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat eller ej, innehar fast driftstÃ¤lle i en avtalsslutande stat fÃ¶r vilket upptagits det lÃ¥n som rÃ¤ntan avser och rÃ¤ntan bestrides av det fasta driftstÃ¤llet, anses dock rÃ¤ntan hÃ¤rrÃ¶ra frÃ¥n den avtalsslutande stat, dÃ¤r det fasta driftstÃ¤llet Ã¤r belÃ¤get.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p70 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">The provisions of paragraphs 1 and 2 shall not apply if the recipient of the interest, being a resident of a Contracting State, has in the other Contracting State in which the interest arises a permanent establishment with which the </SPAN><NOBR>debt-claim</NOBR> from which the interest arises is effectively connected. In such a case the provisions of Article 7 shall apply.</P>
<P class="p179 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">6.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">(Deleted).</SPAN></P>
<P class="p181 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">7.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">Interest shall be deemed to arise in a Contracting State when the payer is that Contracting State itself, a political subdivision, a local authority or a resident of that State. Where, however, the person paying the interest, whether he is a resident of a Contracting State or not, has in a Contracting State a permanent establishment in connection with which the indebtedness on which the interest is paid was incurred, and such interest is borne by such permanent establishment, then such interest shall be deemed to arise in the Contracting State in which the permanent establishment is situated.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p182 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">15 procent av bruttobeloppet i frÃ¥ga om royalty som hÃ¤rrÃ¶r frÃ¥n nyttjande av eller rÃ¤tten att nyttja varumÃ¤rken,</SPAN></P>

<P class="p184 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Med uttrycket â€royaltyâ€ fÃ¶rstÃ¥s i denna artikel varje slag av belopp som betalas sÃ¥som ersÃ¤ttning fÃ¶r nyttjandet av eller rÃ¤tten att nyttja upphovsrÃ¤tt till litterÃ¤ra, konstnÃ¤rliga eller vetenskapliga verk (biograffilm samt film och inspelade band fÃ¶r televisions- eller radiosÃ¤ndning hÃ¤ri inbegripna), patent, varumÃ¤rke, mÃ¶nster eller modell, ritning, hemligt recept eller fabrikationsmetod samt fÃ¶r nyttjan-</SPAN></P>

<P class="p185 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">However, such royalties may also be taxed in the Contracting State in which they arise and according to the laws of that State, but if the beneficial owner of the royalties is a resident of the other Contracting State the tax so charged shall not exceed:</SPAN></P>

<P class="p161 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft11">10 per cent of the gross amount of the royalties in all other cases.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p192 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">Gains from the alienation of immovable property, as defined in paragraph 2 of Article 6, may be taxed in the Contracting State in which the immovable property is situated.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p193 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Gains from the alienation of movable property forming part of the business property of a permanent establishment which an enterprise of a Contracting State has in the other Contracting State or of movable property pertaining to a fixed base available to a resident of a Contracting State in the other Contracting State for the purpose of performing professional services, including such gains from the alienation of such a permanent establishment (alone or together with the whole enterprise) or of such a fixed base, may be taxed in the other State. However, gains from the alienation of ships and aircraft operated in international traffic and movable property pertaining to the operation of such ships and aircraft shall be taxable only in the Contracting State in which the place of effective management of the enterprise is situated.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p194 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Gains from the alienation of any property or right other than those mentioned in paragraphs 1 and 2 may be taxed in both Contracting States.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p222 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">An individual who is, or was immediately before visiting a Contracting State, a resident of the other Contracting State and who is present in the </SPAN><NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> Contracting State solely:</P>
<P class="p223 ft6">a) as a student at a university, college or school in that firstmentioned Contracting State,</P>

<P class="p224 ft6">c) as the recipient of a grant, allowance or award for the primary purpose of study or research from a religious, charitable, scientific or educational organization,</P>
<P class="p225 ft6">shall be exempt from tax in that <NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> Contracting State in respect of remittances from abroad for the purposes of his maintenance, education or training.</P>
<P class="p123 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">A student or trainee who is, or was immediately before visiting a Contracting State, a resident of the other Contracting State and who is present in the </SPAN><NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> Contracting State solely, for the purposes of his education or training shall be exempt from tax in that <NOBR>first-mentioned</NOBR> Contracting State for a period not exceeding three</P>

<P class="p53 ft2">a) Where a resident of Sweden derives income which under the laws of Brazil and in accordance with the provisions of this Convention may be taxed in Brazil, Sweden shall allow â€“ subject to the provisions of the laws of Sweden concerning credit for foreign tax (as it may be amended from time to time without changing the general principle hereof) â€“ as a deduction from the tax on such income, an amount equal to the Brazilian tax paid in respect of such income.</P>
<P class="p234 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">Where a resident of Sweden derives income which, in accordance with the provisions of this Convention, shall be taxable only in Brazil, Sweden may, when determining the graduated rate of Swedish tax, take into account the income which shall be taxable only in Brazil.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p236 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Medborgare i en avtalsslutande stat skall icke i den andra avtalsslutande staten bli fÃ¶remÃ¥l fÃ¶r nÃ¥gon beskattning eller nÃ¥got dÃ¤rmed sammanhÃ¤ngande skattekrav av annat slag eller mer tyngande Ã¤n medborgarna i denna andra stat under samma fÃ¶rhÃ¥llanden Ã¤r eller kan bli underkastade.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p239 ft2">stat.</P>
<P class="p240 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Beskattningen av fast driftstÃ¤lle, som fÃ¶retag i en avtalsslutande stat har i den andra avtalsslutande staten, skall i denna andra stat icke vara mindre fÃ¶rdelaktig Ã¤n beskattningen av fÃ¶retag i denna stat, som bedriver samma verksamhet.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p241 ft2">Denna bestÃ¤mmelse skall icke anses medfÃ¶ra fÃ¶rpliktelse fÃ¶r en avtalsslutande stat att medge personer med hemvist i den andra avtalsslutande staten sÃ¥dana personliga avdrag vid beskattningen, skattebefrielser eller skattenedsÃ¤ttningar, som medges personer med hemvist i den fÃ¶rstnÃ¤mnda staten pÃ¥ grund av civilstÃ¥nd eller fÃ¶rsÃ¶rjningsplikt mot familj.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_1_2">
<P class="p45 ft2">Prop. 2019/20:43</P>
<P class="p49 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">The nationals of a Contracting State shall not be subjected in the other Contracting State to any taxation or any requirement connected therewith which is other or more burdensome than the taxation and connected requirements to which nationals of that other State in the same circumstances are or may be subjected.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p50 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">The term â€œnationalsâ€ means:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p242 ft4"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft17">all individuals possessing the nationality of a Contracting State;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p227 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">all legal persons, partnerships and associations deriving their status as such from the law in force in a Contracting State.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p89 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">The taxation on a permanent establishment which an enterprise of a Contracting State has in the other Contracting State shall not be less favourably levied in that other State than the taxation levied on enterprises of that other State carrying on the same activities.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p243 ft6">This provision shall not be construed as obliging a Contracting State to grant to residents of the other Contracting State any personal allowances, reliefs and reductions for taxation purposes on account of civil status or family responsibilities which it grants to its own residents.</P>
</DIV>

<P class="p95 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">Where a person considers that the actions of one or both of the Contracting States result or will result for him in taxation not in accordance with the provisions of this Convention, he may, irrespective of the remedies provided by the domestic law of those States, present his case to the competent authority of either Contracting State. <P class="p253 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">In no case shall the provisions of paragraphs 1 and 2 be construed so as to impose on a Contracting State the obligation:</SPAN></P>

<P class="p95 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">to supply information which would disclose any trade, business, industrial, commercial or professsional secret or trade process, or information, the disclosure of which would be contrary to public policy (</SPAN><SPAN class="ft36">ordre public</SPAN>).</P>
<P class="p254 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">If information is requested by a Contracting State in accordance with this Article, the other Contracting State shall use its information gathering measures to obtain</SPAN></P>

The obligation contained in the preceding sentence is subject to the limitations of paragraph 3 but in no case shall such limitations be construed to permit a Contracting State to decline to supply information solely because it has no domestic interest in such information.</P>
<P class="p246 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">5.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">In no case shall the provisions of paragraph 3 be construed to permit a Contracting State to decline to supply information solely because the information is held by a bank, other financial institution, nominee or person acting in an agency or a fiduciary capacity or because it relates to ownership interests in a person.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_2_1">
<P class="p40 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Om inte annat fÃ¶ljer av denna artikel ska en person med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat inte vara berÃ¤ttigad till en fÃ¶rmÃ¥n som annars skulle ges enligt detta avtal (fÃ¶rutom fÃ¶rmÃ¥n som ges enligt artikel 4 punkt 3 eller artikel 25) sÃ¥vida personen vid den tidpunkt dÃ¥ fÃ¶rmÃ¥nen skulle ha givits inte Ã¤r en sÃ¥dan â€kvalificerad personâ€ som anges i punkt 2.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p80 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">En person med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat Ã¤r en kvalificerad person vid den tidpunkt dÃ¥ en fÃ¶rmÃ¥n annars skulle ges enligt detta avtal, om personen vid denna tidpunkt Ã¤r:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p259 ft2">a) en fysisk person,</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2_2">
<P class="p260 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Except as otherwise provided in this Article, a resident of a Contracting State shall not be entitled to a benefit that would otherwise be accorded by this Convention (other than a benefit under paragraph 3 of Article 4 or Article 25) unless such resident is a â€œqualified personâ€, as defined in paragraph 2, at the time that the benefit would be accorded.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p261 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">A resident of a Contracting State shall be a qualified person at a time when a benefit would otherwise be accorded by the Convention if, at that time, the resident is:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p262 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">an individual;</SPAN></P>

<P class="p264 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">ett bolag eller en annan person, om dess viktigaste aktieslag regelmÃ¤ssigt omsÃ¤tts pÃ¥ en eller flera erkÃ¤nda aktiebÃ¶rser,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p265 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">en person som inte Ã¤r en fysisk person som Ã¤r en icke vinstdrivande organisation enligt Ã¶verenskommelse mellan de behÃ¶riga myndigheterna,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p266 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">en person som inte Ã¤r en fysisk person, om, vid denna tidpunkt och under minst hÃ¤lften av dagarna under en tolvmÃ¥nadersperiod som innefattar denna tidpunkt, personer med hemvist i den avtalsslutande staten och som Ã¤r berÃ¤ttigade till fÃ¶rmÃ¥ner enligt det skatteavtal som omfattas enligt a)â€’d) i denna punkt innehar, direkt eller indirekt, minst 50 procent av aktierna i denna person.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p267 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">a) En person med hemvist i en avtalsslutande stat Ã¤r berÃ¤ttigad till avtalsfÃ¶rmÃ¥ner betrÃ¤ffande inkomst som fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvas frÃ¥n den andra avtalsslutande staten, oavsett om personen Ã¤r en kvalificerad person, om personen Ã¤r verksam genom att aktivt bedriva en affÃ¤rsrÃ¶relse i den fÃ¶rstnÃ¤mnda avtalsslutande staten, och inkomsten som fÃ¶rvÃ¤rvas frÃ¥n den andra avtalsslutande staten hÃ¤rrÃ¶r frÃ¥n eller har samband med denna affÃ¤rsrÃ¶relse. Vid tillÃ¤mpningen av denna artikel ska uttrycket â€aktivt bedriva en affÃ¤rsrÃ¶relseâ€ inte omfatta fÃ¶ljande verksamheter eller nÃ¥gon kombination av dessa:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p268 ft2">1) verksamhet som holdingbolag,</P>

<P class="p52 ft2">34<SPAN style="padding-left:106px;">koncern,</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p100 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">that Contracting State, or a political subdivision or local authority thereof, or an agency or instrumentality of that State, political subdivision or local authority;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p140 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">c)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">a company or other entity, if the principal class of its shares is regularly traded on one or more recognised stock exchanges;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p100 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">d)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">a person, other than an individual, that is a </SPAN><NOBR>non-profit</NOBR> organisation agreed upon by the competent authorities;</P>
<P class="p140 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">e)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">a person other than an individual if, at that time and on at least half of the days of a twelvemonth period that includes that time, persons who are residents of that Contracting State and that are entitled to benefits of this Convention under </SPAN><NOBR>sub-paragraphs</NOBR> a) to</P>

<P class="p60 ft2">7. a) Where:</P>

<P class="p436 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">In the case of Brazil, double taxation shall be avoided as follows:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p437 ft2">a) Where a resident of Brazil derives income which, in accordance with the provisions of this Convention, may be taxed in Sweden, Brazil shall allow, according to the provisions of its law regarding the elimination of double taxation (which shall not affect the general principle hereof), as a deduction from the tax on the income of that resident, an amount equal to the income tax paid in Sweden. Such deduction, however, shall not exceed that part of the income tax, as computed before the deduction is given, which is attributable to the income which may be taxed in Sweden.</P>
<P class="p438 ft2">b) Where in accordance with any provision of the Convention income derived by a resident of a Brazil is exempt from tax in Brazil, Brazil may nevertheless, in calculating the amount of tax on the remaining income of such resident, take into account the exempted income.</P>

<P class="p234 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">Where a resident of Sweden derives income which, in accordance with the provisions of this Convention, shall be taxable only in Brazil, Sweden may, when determining the graduated rate of Swedish tax, take into account the income which shall be taxable only in Brazil.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p462 ft28"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft29">DÃ¥ en avtalsslutande stat begÃ¤r upplysningar enligt denna artikel ska den andra avtalsslutande staten anvÃ¤nda de medel som denna stat fÃ¶rfogar Ã¶ver fÃ¶r att inhÃ¤mta de begÃ¤rda upplysningarna, Ã¤ven om denna andra stat inte har behov av upplysningarna fÃ¶r sina egna beskattningsÃ¤ndamÃ¥l. <P class="p463 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">In no case shall the provisions of paragraphs 1 and 2 be construed so as to impose on a Contracting State the obligation:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p130 ft6">a) to carry out administrative measures at variance with the laws and administrative practice of that or of the other Contracting State;</P>

<P class="p55 ft28"><SPAN class="ft2">4.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft29">If information is requested by a Contracting State in accordance with this Article, the other Contracting State shall use its information gathering measures to obtain the requested information, even though that other State may not need such information for its own tax purposes. The obligation contained in the preceding sentence is subject to the limitations of paragraph 3 but in no case shall such limitations be construed to permit a Contracting State to decline to supply information solely because it has no domestic interest in such information.</SPAN></P>

<P class="p472 ft2">ARTICLE 11</P>
<P class="p412 ft4">The following new Article <NOBR>26-A</NOBR> shall be inserted immediately after Article 26 of the Convention:</P>
<P class="p473 ft25">â€œArticle <NOBR>26-A</NOBR> <SPAN class="ft63">Entitlement to benefits</SPAN></P>

<P class="p475 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">A resident of a Contracting State shall be a qualified person at a time when a benefit would otherwise be accorded by the Convention if, at that time, the resident is:</SPAN></P>

<P class="p95 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft20">Det Ã¤r fÃ¶rstÃ¥tt att bestÃ¤mmelserna i brasiliansk skattelagstiftning som inte tillÃ¥ter att royalties, som de definierats enligt artikel 12 punkt 3, som betalas av ett fast driftstÃ¤lle belÃ¤get i Brasilien till en person med hemvist i Sverige som bedriver rÃ¶relse frÃ¥n ett sÃ¥dant fast driftstÃ¤lle fÃ¥r dras av nÃ¤r den beskattningsbara inkomsten fÃ¶r det fasta driftstÃ¤llet faststÃ¤lls, inte stÃ¥r i strid med bestÃ¤mmelserna artikel 24 punkt 3.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p521 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">Det Ã¤r fÃ¶rstÃ¥tt att bestÃ¤mmelserna i detta avtal inte hindrar tillÃ¤mpningen i en avtalsslutande stat av bestÃ¤mmelser i dess interna lagstiftning som syftar till att fÃ¶rhindra skatteflykt och skatteundandragande.</SPAN></P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_3_2">
<P class="p95 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft44">It is understood that the provisions of the Brazilian tax law that do not allow that royalties as defined in paragraph 3 of Article 12, paid by a permanent establishment situated in Brazil to a resident of Sweden that carries on business in Brazil through such a permanent establishment, be deductible at the moment of the determination of the taxable income of the above referred permanent establishment, are not in conflict with the provisions of paragraph 3 of Article 24.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p522 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft67">It is understood that the provisions of the Convention shall not prevent a Contracting State from applying the provisions of its domestic legislation aimed at countering tax evasion and avoidance.</SPAN></P>

<DIV id="id_5_2">
<P class="p53 ft6">Det Ã¤r fÃ¶rstÃ¥tt att om FÃ¶renade Kungariket vid nÃ¥gon tidpunkt lÃ¤mnar Europeiska unionen, sÃ¥ ska aktiebÃ¶rsen i London fortsatt vara en â€erkÃ¤nd aktiebÃ¶rsâ€ enligt artikel <NOBR>26-A</NOBR> punkt 2 c).â€</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_5_3">
<P class="p53 ft6">It is understood that if at any time the United Kingdom leaves the European Union, the London Stock Exchange shall remain a â€œrecognised stock exchangeâ€ for the purposes of <NOBR>sub-paragraph</NOBR> c) of paragraph 2 of Article <NOBR>26-A.â€</NOBR></P>

<DIV id="id_1">
<P class="p52 ft2">ARTIKEL 13</P>
<P class="p512 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">De avtalsslutande staterna ska skriftligen underrÃ¤tta varandra nÃ¤r de Ã¥tgÃ¤rder vidtagits som enligt respektive stats lagstiftning krÃ¤vs fÃ¶r att detta protokoll ska trÃ¤da i kraft.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p523 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">Protokollet trÃ¤der i kraft den trettionde dagen efter det att den sista av dessa underrÃ¤ttelser tagits emot och ska dÃ¤refter tillÃ¤mpas:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p524 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">i frÃ¥ga om kÃ¤llskatter, pÃ¥ belopp som betalas eller tillgodofÃ¶rs den 1 januari det Ã¥r som fÃ¶ljer nÃ¤rmast efter den dag dÃ¥ protokollet trÃ¤der i kraft eller senare,</SPAN></P>
<P class="p524 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">i frÃ¥ga om andra skatter pÃ¥ inkomst, pÃ¥ skatt som pÃ¥fÃ¶rs fÃ¶r beskattningsÃ¥r som bÃ¶rjar den 1 januari det Ã¥r som fÃ¶ljer nÃ¤rmast efter den dag dÃ¥ protokollet trÃ¤der i kraft eller senare.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p525 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">Utan hinder av bestÃ¤mmelserna i punkt 2, ska bestÃ¤mmelserna i artikel 26 i avtalet, sÃ¥som Ã¤ndrade genom artikel 10 i detta protokoll tillÃ¤mpas frÃ¥n och med den dag protokollet trÃ¤der i kraft, oavsett vilket beskattningsÃ¥r som beskattningsansprÃ¥ket hÃ¤nfÃ¶r sig till.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p465 ft2">ARTIKEL 14</P>
<P class="p512 ft6">Detta protokoll upphÃ¶r att gÃ¤lla vid den tidpunkt som avtalet upphÃ¶r att gÃ¤lla i enlighet med artikel 29 i avtalet.</P>
<P class="p526 ft6">Till bekrÃ¤ftelse hÃ¤rav har undertecknade, dÃ¤rtill vederbÃ¶rligen bemyndigade, undertecknat detta avtal.</P>
</DIV>
<DIV id="id_2">
<P class="p52 ft2">ARTICLE 13</P>
<P class="p527 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">1.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft16">Each of the Contracting States shall in writing notify the other of the completion of the procedures required by its laws for the bringing into force of this Protocol.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p528 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">2.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">This Protocol shall enter into force on the thirtieth day after the date of the receipt of the later of the notifications referred to in paragraph 1 and shall have effect:</SPAN></P>
<P class="p529 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">a)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">in respect of taxes withheld at source, for amounts paid or credited on or after the first day of January of the year next following the date on which the Protocol enters into force;</SPAN></P>
<P class="p530 ft6"><SPAN class="ft2">b)</SPAN><SPAN class="ft10">in respect of other taxes on income, on taxes chargeable for any tax year beginning on or after the first day of January of the year next following the date on which the Protocol enters into force.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p531 ft2"><SPAN class="ft2">3.</SPAN><SPAN class="ft15">Notwithstanding the provisions of paragraph 2, the provisions of Article 26 of the Convention, as amended by Article 10 of this Protocol, shall have effect from the date of entry into force of the Protocol, without regard to the taxable year to which the matter or revenue claim relates.</SPAN></P>
<P class="p472 ft2">ARTICLE 14</P>
<P class="p527 ft6">This Protocol shall cease to have effect at such time as the Convention ceases to have effect in accordance with Article 29 of the Convention.</P>
<P class="p531 ft6">In witness whereof the undersigned, being duly authorized thereto by their respective Governments, have signed this Protocol.</P>
</DIV>
